title: AI Blog App
description: Create blog based on topic and keywords, secure data of users, mongoose to store data. In addition, Bootstrap, OpenAI, Auth0, and Stripe are included in it.

title: Store with React Js
description: Store based on React Js include functionality like Add-to-cart Use React Hooks, Api fetch and Customize design for better user interaction.

title: To-Do List App
description: To-Do List App Using JavaScript include functionality Edit,Delete,Done Task and Shows the Task adding time with date.In addition the tasks and changes will not remove after reload due to use of Local Storage.

title: Lawyer Management System
description: Final Project [ Lawyer Management System ] of Web Technology using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Bootstrap. In addition many new features with the help of JavaScript. Moreover Complete Website is Responsive.
